frontMatter.title: How I Created My Voice Assistant With On-Device Wake Word Detection On ESP32 Using Micro Wake Word
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this article, we will look at how I created my Voice Assistant with an ESP32 S3 with on-device Wake Word detection using MicroWake Word to send commands to Home Assistant
